snippet: A federal appeals judge ruled that Texas could not ban Planned Parenthood from receiving state money.
abstract: Federal Appeals Judge Jerry E Smith rules that Texas cannot ban Planned Parenthood from receiving state money; decides there is sufficient evidence that state law banning organization from participating in state's Women's Health Program is unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals judge ruled that Texas could not ban Planned Parenthood from receiving state money.

headline.main: Texas: Judge Rejects Law on Planned Parenthood
headline.print_headline: Texas: Judge Rejects Law On Planned Parenthood
